title: 06/18/2021 - HOUR 2 - Bucks & Nets, Luka Doncic & Top 10 Young NBA Players to Build Around
itunes:title: 06/18/2021 - HOUR 2 - Bucks & Nets, Luka Doncic & Top 10 Young NBA Players to Build Around
description:
Colin lists his top 10 young NBA players to build around,

How the Mavericks should build around Luka Doncic,

Nets shouldn’t worry about loss to the Bucks in Game 6,

Can Matt LaFleur & Aaron Rodgers still win Super Bowl in Green Bay,



Guest: NBA Champion Antoine Walker

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
